DOC.brief_summary: Epipage 2 ( epidemiologic study small-for-gestational-age child ) nationwide study implement improve knowledge outcome preterm child France . This study launch March 28 , 2011 include three group preterm child , bear 35 week : extremely preterm infant ( born 22 26 complete week gestation ) , preterm child ( bear 27 31 complete week ) moderately preterm child ( bear 32 34 complete week ) . These child study birth age 12 year . At birth , data maternal infant ' characteristic collect medical record . At one two year , questionnaires sent family physician ( two year ) allow collect data child 's life health . At five half year , medical psychological assessment specifically implement study order evaluate motor cognitive disorder population .
